To avoid fluctuations in sugars:
1. Develop and follow a regular routine of meal timings (see section on diet) and activity. 

2. Anticipate situations where sugars might become high (eating out at parties/weddings, periods of low physical activity like vacations etc,) and low sugars (excessive physical activity, low intake) to adjust insulin dose accordingly. 

3. Do not change insulin dose based on a single abnormal record, especially when there are other known causes for the same.
